article.Heading: Have ensured that small traders are not burdened by GST: Prime Minister Modi
article.Summary: Watch Prime Minister Narendra Modi, President Pranab Mukherjee and Finance Minister Arun Jaitley speak at launch GST in Central Hall of Parliament on July 1 2017.
article.Body: Watch Prime Minister Narendra Modi, President Pranab Mukherjee and Finance Minister Arun Jaitley speak at launch GST in Central Hall of Parliament on July 1 2017.
